## Data Import: CSVs

Lets import data using the `reader` package

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)

```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
View(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)

```

`read_csv` iotions ..

```{r, eval = FALSE}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA", 999, 88), skip = 2)
```
